metadata.description: the Location in which your OMS will be provisioned

metadata.Description: List of recipients for the email alert separated by semicolon

metadata.description: The name of the action group to be associated with the alerts actions

properties.description: [concat('Check Database reporting high DTU_', parameters('deploymentId'),'-core-db')]

source.query: [concat('let resourceName = "',parameters('deploymentId'),'-core-db','"; let metricName ="dtu_consumption_percent";let resourceProvider ="MICROSOFT.SQL";let resourceIdContains ="/DATABASES/";AzureMetrics | where ResourceProvider== resourceProvider and ResourceId contains resourceIdContains and MetricName== metricName and Resource == toupper(resourceName) | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Maximum) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m),Resource | top 60 by TimeGenerated')]

aznsAction.emailSubject: [concat('Check Database reporting high DTU_', parameters('deploymentId'),'-core-db')]

source.query: [concat('let resourceName = "',parameters('deploymentId'),'-tasks-db','";let metricName ="workers_percent";let resourceProvider ="MICROSOFT.SQL";let resourceIdContains ="/DATABASES/";AzureMetrics | where ResourceProvider==resourceProvider and ResourceId contains resourceIdContains and MetricName==metricName and Resource == toupper(resourceName) | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Maximum) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m),Resource | top 60 by TimeGenerated')]

aznsAction.emailSubject: [concat('Check Database reporting high concurrent requests_', parameters('deploymentId'),'-tasks-db')]
